name: Conserve
description:
Become a Savior for the trees in the jungle.
Save it from the wood cutter by placing FRUIT Generator Machine at necessary places.
How To Play:- Place Fruit Generator in marked areas using Left click.

Each generator costs 50 credits. Scoring points will give you +20 credits.

Aim- To stop the wood cutter from reaching the Mother Tree.

Health- Mother Tree has limited health and will fall if wood cutters reach her.

CAN YOU STOP THIS CLIMATE CRISIS BY TAKING POWER IN YOUR OWN HANDS!!!

Contribution - Yash Bansal, Avash Biswas, Kritarth Chavda
